name: otp-keys
description: GNOME Shell extension to show and copy OTP keys.

scripts.build:protobuf-bundle: npx pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs -o proto/static.js proto/otpauth-migration.proto && npx browserify proto/static.js -s MigrationPayloadRoot -o dist/vendor/protobuf-bundle.js && shx rm proto/static.js
scripts.build:assets: shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp -r metadata.json extension.js prefs.js otplib.js totp.js LICENSE README.md dist/
scripts.build:vendor: shx mkdir -p dist/vendor && npx browserify -r jsqr -s jsQR -o dist/vendor/jsqr.js
scripts.build:schemas: shx mkdir -p dist/schemas && shx cp schemas/*.gschema.xml dist/schemas/ && glib-compile-schemas dist/schemas/
scripts.build:locale: shx mkdir -p dist/locale && for f in locale/*.po; do lang=$(basename "$f" .po); shx mkdir -p dist/locale/$lang/LC_MESSAGES; msgfmt "$f" -o dist/locale/$lang/LC_MESSAGES/otp-keys.mo; done
scripts.build: npm run build:protobuf-bundle && npm run build:assets && npm run build:vendor && npm run build:schemas && npm run build:locale
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.install:user: npm run package && gnome-extensions install --force otp-keys@osmank3.net.zip && gnome-extensions enable otp-keys@osmank3.net
scripts.uninstall: gnome-extensions uninstall otp-keys@osmank3.net && echo 'Uzant覺 kald覺r覺ld覺.'
scripts.locale:update-po: for f in locale/*.po; do msgmerge --update "$f" locale/otp-keys.pot; done
scripts.locale:update: npm run locale:update-pot && npm run locale:update-po
